Member Function Documentation

uint32 CompressedMipMapCalculator::dataSize (  ) 

This method returns the number of bytes for the data segment of the texture.

uint32 CompressedMipMapCalculator::ddsSize (  ) 

This method returns the number of bytes for the texture.

This method differs from data size, in that it includes the optional dds file header of 128 bytes.

void CompressedMipMapCalculator::dimensions ( int  width,
int  height 
)

This method sets the dimensions of the texture, and calculates all relevant data for all mip-maps thereof.

It assumes that all mip-map levels are used.

Parameters:
width The new width of the texture
height The new height of the texture.

int CompressedMipMapCalculator::height (  )  [inline]

void CompressedMipMapCalculator::mipMap ( int  level,
MipData &  ret 
)

This method returns the byte offset and stride for a particular mipmap level.

Parameters:
level The mip map level to retrieve.
ret The returned mip map data.

uint32 CompressedMipMapCalculator::numMipMaps (  ) 

This method returns the number of mip-map levels for the texture.
